Egg Fried Rice
3 tbsp vegetable oil pork fat
0.5 shallot , finely chopped pork fat
4 cloves garlic
0.5 tsp chilli paste
15g ginger
2 eggs
2 plates rice, cooked the day before and then refrigerated
1/4 tsp msg
sesame oil, to taste
soy sauce, to taste
white pepper, to taste
2 spring onions, finely chopped green parts only
  1. Fry the shallot, garlic, chilli paste and ginger in the oil for a minute or so - not enough that the garlic browns
  2. Add the eggs, stir and fry until it's just cooked
  3. Add the rice and fry until warmed through
  4. Add the msg, then the sesame oil, soy sauce and white pepper to taste
  5. Mix in the spring onions and serve
Footer. Not much here really. Nice to have a footer though.
